description: Enterprise techniques used by PowerExchange, ATT&CK software S1173 (v1.0)
name: PowerExchange (S1173)

techniques.comment: [PowerExchange](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1173) can receive and send back the results of executed C2 commands through email.(Citation: Symantec Crambus OCT 2023)
[PowerExchange](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1173) can use PowerShell to execute commands received from C2.(Citation: Symantec Crambus OCT 2023)
[PowerExchange](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1173) can decode and decrypt C2 commands received via email.(Citation: Symantec Crambus OCT 2023)
[PowerExchange](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1173) can exfiltrate files via its email C2 channel.(Citation: Symantec Crambus OCT 2023)
[PowerExchange](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1173) can decode Base64-encoded files and call `WriteAllBytes` to write the files to compromised hosts.(Citation: Symantec Crambus OCT 2023)
